function.name: web_search
function.description: Performs a web search based on the query and returns the top search results.

query.description: The search query to perform (Warning: have to be concise and precise).

max_results.description: The maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 10.

timeout.description: Timeout for the search request in seconds. Defaults to 10.

function.name: visit_webpage
function.description: Visits a webpage at the given URL and reads its content as a markdown string.

url.description: The URL of the webpage to visit.

function.name: load_file
function.description: Loads data from a file based on its extension.

file_path.description: The path to the file to be loaded.

function.name: reverse_text
function.description: Reverses an input string to make it readable.

input_text.description: The reversed text string to process.

function.name: analyze_chess
function.description: Analyzes a chess position from an image and return the game situation in FEN format.

image_path.description: The path to the image file containing the chess game.

function.name: analyze_document
function.description: Extracts specific information from a local PDF or local text document based on given keywords.

file_path.description: The path to the PDF or text document to analyze.

keywords.description: A list of keywords to search for in the document.

function.name: classify_foods
function.description: Classifies a list of foods into specific botanical categories.

food_list.description: A list of foods to classify.

function.name: transcribe_audio
function.description: Transcribes the content of an audio file into text.

file_path.description: The path to the audio file to transcribe.

language.description: The language of the audio content. If None, the language will be detected automatically. Defaults to None.

function.name: execute_code
function.description: Executes Python code from a file or a string and returns the final result.

file_path.description: The path to the file containing the Python code to execute.

code_string.description: The Python code as a string to execute.

function.name: analyze_excel
function.description: Analyzes data from an Excel file to extract specific information.

file_path.description: The path to the Excel file to analyze.

sheet_name.description: The name of the sheet to read. If None, the first sheet is used.

specific_columns.description: A list of column names to extract. If None, all columns are extracted.

function.name: analyze_youtube_video
function.description: Analyse the text description and the visual content of a Youtube video.

video_url.description: The URL of the YouTube video to analyze.

function.name: calculate_sum
function.description: Calculates the sum of a list of numbers.

numbers.description: A list of numbers to be summed from the question.

function.name: retrieve_knowledge
function.description: Retrieves knowledge from a database with a provided query.

query.description: The query to search for in the vector store.

n_results.description: The number of results to return. Default is 1.

distance_threshold.description: The minimum distance score for results. Default is 0.5.
